resources.string: Tap here to enable the accessibility service
Tap Here to enable draw over permissions
Tap Here to enable storage access for a folder

1. Drag to move.

2. Open whichever app and activity.

3. Double tap them icon to record a Snapshot!

4. Tap this text to dismiss this text!

Nice! You can find the screenshot in the usual screenshots folder. The elements should be waiting in a file in the folder you specified earlier.

Feel free to blur the screenshot or change any element info for privacy sake.

		Thanks!
